attributes.action: Make Tuesday 22nd June 2021 a Bank Holiday.
attributes.additional_details: Because we’ve been locked in for over 12 months and the country deserves to go OUT out.
attributes.background: Give the country a day off and make Tuesday 22nd of June a Bank Holiday.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make June 22nd (or the day after Nightclubs reopen) a bank holiday
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576510
